메인 컨텐츠 시작

Trauma

CMF Fixation System

  • Indications

    Double Engine Cranio-maxillofacial System is indicated for use in trauma repair and reconstruction of the craniofacial and mandibular skeleton.

  • Contraindications

    The use in areas with active or latent in fection or insufficient quantity or quality of bone.
